name: Stack Auth
headline: The open-source Auth0 alternative
description:
Stack is the open-source authN, authZ, and user management platform.

We build for devs who want to iterate quickly, offering both managed auth and self-hosting. You can set it up in one minute and scale with the project as it grows.

Stack was built by repeat founders with strong technical backgrounds. Check out our GitHub: https://github.com/stack-auth/stack

founders.name: Konstantin Wohlwend, Founder
founders.description:
I build user authentication @ Stack.

If you're building a modern web app with user logins, we should chat!

https://n2d4.github.io ðŸ‘‹

founders.name: Zai Shi, Founder
founders.description: Building the best user login/management experience for developers, 100% open-source!

[Backed by ![Y Combinator Logo](https://stack-auth.com/images/yc-expanded-orange.svg)](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/stack-auth>)
# Auth can be good.
Stack Auth is the open-source Auth0 alternative.AuthN, authZ, and user management in just 5 minutes.
Next.js setup wizard:
[$```
npx @stackframe/init-stack@latest
```
](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup>)
[Get Started ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup>)
[Join Discord](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/discord.stack-auth.com/>)
### Beautiful Next.js integration
We pride ourselves with our lean and responsive design. Your users will love it, and your developers too.
<SignIn /><UserButton /><AccountSettings />Admin dashboardEmail templates
![Features Illustration](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogin.736cee01.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Features
Authentication
#### Password, SSO, 2FA, and more
Beautifully styled components to help you get started quickly. No need to worry about design and internal logic.
[Get Started ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup>)
#### Headless or headful UI
Integrate our shadcn/ui components, or build your own with our headless SDK.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/customization/custom-pages>)
#### JWTs without the JWTs
Stack manages JWTs and access tokens for you, so you get the performance benefits without ever having to think about them.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/users>)
Authorization
#### Organizations & teams
Manage B2B customers with orgs & teams, supporting email invitations, team components, and management tools.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/concepts/orgs-and-teams>)
#### Permissions & RBAC
Define arbitrary permission trees and org-wide roles.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/concepts/permissions>)
#### 3rd-party OAuth
Access third-party OAuth APIs such as Gmail or OneDrive without having to think about OAuth flows or token refreshes.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/concepts/oauth>)
User Management
#### REST API
Use our client and server APIs to build custom front- and backends.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/rest-api/auth>)
#### Impersonation
Impersonate users to debug issues or help your customers.
[Go To Dashboard ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/app.stack-auth.com>)
#### Webhooks
Sync with Slack, your database, or any other service.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/concepts/webhooks>)
## New features every week
We build and ship quickly. Subscribe to [our newsletter](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/stack-auth.beehiiv.com>) or read [our changelog](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/stack-auth.beehiiv.com>) to get the latest updates.
Subscribe ->
### Here's how we compare
Among its competitors, Stack Auth is unique by being open-source, developer-friendly, _and_ feature-rich.
Auth0Supabase AuthNextAuth/Auth.jsClerkKeycloakSuperTokensAnyone else
#### 
![Stack](https://stack-auth.com/_next/static/media/logo-icon.1bdff31d.svg)
vs. Auth0
Stack is built for devs who want to own their auth.
##### Stack is open-source
Stack is 100% open-source and self-hostable.
##### Stack is for developers
Stack is built for devs, not enterprises. It's simple to understand, use, and integrate into your Next.js + Postgres tech stack.
##### Stack has reasonable pricing
Stack grows organically without a marketing budget and sales team, and can afford to be multiple magnitudes cheaper.
[Learn More ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup?competitor=auth0>)
## Join the community.
As an open-source project, we rely on organic growth. Here's what our users have to say.
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/static/media/lucas-qacomet.b70ab364.svg)
Lucas
Founder @ QAComet
We were able to replace our Clerk implementation with Stack in a matter of hours. It's empowering to have the flexibility of an open-source alternative with a simple to use interface and a responsive team!
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Frauchg.0cc33a80.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Guillermo Rauch
Founder & CEO @ Vercel
React <Components /> as the universal integration API â€” https://stack-auth.com
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjackmark.f29b8583.webp&w=128&q=75)
Jack Mark
Founder @ EdTech Leaders
I had Stack Auth up and running in no time, and it's exactly what I needed for my project. Anyone else using this for their apps?
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fliam.7c99ad6e.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Liam Collins
Founder @ Tailwind Health
It's so easy to get Stack Auth up and running, and the founders are amazing too!
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fstefan.01950a3b.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Stefan S.
CEO @ anomys
Just discovered Stack Auth Is the auth pain finally over ? Or getting close...
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fken.531e0d04.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Ken Taylor
I would just like to say Thank you Stack Auth
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Froocell.ea3d15de.webp&w=128&q=75)
M. Russell
Indie dev
Can't wait to rip clerk out of my app ðŸ™‚
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fnicola-lanzilotto.64c81a06.webp&w=128&q=75)
Nicola Lanzilotto
Product @ Tiledesk
I'm impressed with Stack Auth's ease of use, customizability, and security features. If you're looking for a reliable and developer-friendly user authentication and authorization solution, Stack Auth is definitely worth considering.
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjuliamltools.afbc7b60.jpg&w=128&q=75)
JuliaMLTools
The experience so far setting up Stack Auth was world class. Good luck guys! And, keep executing on that smooth simplicity!
![Icon 01](https://stack-auth.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjerad.562b82d0.jpg&w=128&q=75)
Jerad Maplethorpe
Indie maker

Getting started with Stack
## Everything you need to know
#### Can I integrate Stack into my existing project?
Yes! It is very straightforward! Stack does not require any special architecture and can merge well into any Next.js project that uses the App router.
#### How do I sync user data with my database?
For most of the time, you don't need to sync user data with your database. You can store JSON data in the user object itself. However, if you really need to sync data, you can use our webhooks.
#### Can I deploy Stack on my own servers?
Yes! Stack is fully open-source and you can self-host it on your own servers.
#### How can I integrate Stack into my backend?
Stack provides a Next.js server side SDK that you can just import and use. If you are using a different language or framework, you can use our REST API.
#### Does Stack support SSO with SAML?
Yes! Let's get in touch and we can help you.
#### What kind of support do you offer?
We offer a range of support from data migration to custom on-premise deployments.
The developer-friendly authentication platform
## Start building with Stack today
Secure your application with the best open-source authentication and user management platform.
[Get Started ->](https://stack-auth.com/<https:/docs.stack-auth.com/getting-started/setup>)
[![Stack](https://stack-auth.com/_next/static/media/logo.534acee3.svg)](https://stack-auth.com/</>)

**Stack Auth: An Open-Source Alternative for Developers**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, Stack Auth is revolutionizing the world of authentication and user management. It's essentially an open-source alternative to Auth0, designed specifically for developers who need speed and flexibility in their projects.

### Mission and Vision
Stack Auth encapsulates the idea of building a platform that enhances the way developers manage authentication (authN) and authorization (authZ). The goal? To empower developers with tools that allow them to iterate quickly, whether they prefer managed solutions or self-hosting. At Stack Auth, you can have your user management system set up in just a minute, making it a perfect fit for fast-growing projects.

### What They Offer
- **Ease of Use:** With an emphasis on simplicity, you can install and integrate Stack Auth into any Next.js project without fuss.
- **Managed and Self-Hosted Options:** Developers can choose how they'd like to deploy, whether in-house or using Stack Auth's hosting services.
- **Developer-Centric Features:** They offer support for standards like JWT, SSO, and 2FA, along with robust user management capabilitiesâ€”all within a developer-friendly interface.

### Robust Functionality
Stack Auth not only manages authentication but also offers seamless integrations for organizations and teams, permissions management, and even webhooks for syncing with tools like Slack and databases. It caters to a variety of user needs with features that are both intuitive and powerful.

### Comparative Advantage
What sets Stack Auth apart from its competitors? It's the combination of being fully open-source, developer-focused, and offering reasonable pricing. Stack Auth appeals to the developer community looking for transparency and control over their authentication systems. It's built for those who want to own their auth solutions rather than being tied to enterprise-level options.

### Community and Growth
Being an open-source project, organic growth is vital for Stack Auth. The feedback from users speaks volumesâ€”developers have reported rapid implementations and high satisfaction thanks to the responsive support team. You can check out their [GitHub](https://github.com/stack-auth/stack) for contributions and to become a part of the community.

### Pricing
They have a straightforward pricing model:
- **Free:** For individuals wanting to self-host.
- **Team Plan:** $49/month for small teams.
- **Growth Plan:** $299/month for larger enterprises needing scalability.

### Conclusion
In a nutshell, Stack Auth is positioning itself as a vital tool for developers looking to simplify their authentication needs without sacrificing control or flexibility. Itâ€™s about building with confidence, and if you're in the tech community, itâ€™s worth checking out. To learn more or to get started, visit their [website](https://stack-auth.com). 

This isnâ€™t just about identity management; itâ€™s about empowering developers to take charge of their tech stack. If youâ€™re tired of the cumbersome setups of traditional authentication services, Stack Auth might just be what youâ€™re looking for.
